desc.desc: Work as a team to translate business requirements into workable programming code.
Work as a team to solve challenging project work designing, building, testing and supporting technical solutions.
Conducted cyber security related policy review research. Worked in small teams. Presented findings in both oral and written form.
task: Studied title authorities and government policy effecting cybersecurity
Worked as a team of 4 to produce and summarize our findings in a 10-page document.
